attributes.action: have criminals be put into the armed forces for there punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: criminals should be put into the armed forces for punishment as we normaly have a shortage of forces men and women..as they will be given disapline and respect..and a career for when and if they get out the army...it would also stop over crowding in the prisons...

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
